mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, L.point AS extra__likePoint FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN articleLike AS L ON A.id = L.articleId WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY A.id DESC
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articleLike SET regDate = NOW(), articleId = #{id}, memberId = #{memberId}, `point` = 1
INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, displayStatus = 1
